core_agents.name: Market Research & Validation
core_agents.role: Discover and validate high-potential SaaS opportunities using public data and community discussions.
tasks: Scrape trending startup and SaaS communities (Product Hunt, Reddit, Indie Hackers).
Perform semantic clustering to find common pain points.
Assign a Market Viability Score (MVS) based on engagement, urgency, and scalability.
Store top-ranked opportunities in Supabase under 'validated_ideas'.

core_agents.name: Idea Refinement & Product Blueprint
core_agents.role: Transform validated ideas into well-structured SaaS product blueprints ready for design and launch.
tasks: Generate value propositions, core features, and differentiators.
Outline MVP scope, tech stack recommendation, and monetization model.
Write investor-style one-page summaries and elevator pitches.
Save outputs in Supabase with 'blueprint' tags.

core_agents.name: UI/UX & Prototype Designer
core_agents.role: Auto-generate initial UI wireframes, color palettes, and brand identity for each SaaS idea.
tasks: Generate low-fidelity wireframes and component descriptions.
Create Tailwind + React templates ready to deploy on Replit.
Integrate with Landing Page Agent for real-time preview generation.

core_agents.name: Landing Page & Copywriter
core_agents.role: Create compelling, conversion-optimized landing pages for SaaS launches.
tasks: Generate hero sections, CTAs, and testimonials automatically.
Create full landing page structures using Next.js and Tailwind.
Embed Supabase-authenticated signup forms and mailing lists.
Deploy auto-preview URLs on Replit for founder review.

core_agents.name: Pricing Strategy Optimizer
core_agents.role: Design data-driven pricing models and plans for the SaaS product.
tasks: Analyze competitors' pricing via scraped data and APIs.
Recommend tiered plans with psychological pricing and feature mapping.
Test pricing hypotheses with simulated market models.
Save optimized pricing tiers in Supabase under 'pricing_models'.

core_agents.name: Backend Automation (n8n Integrator)
core_agents.role: Automate SaaS marketing, content distribution, and analytics workflows.
tasks: Auto-generate n8n JSON workflows for email campaigns, social posting, and data collection.
Connect Replit triggers to n8n webhooks for continuous automation.
Handle analytics syncs and Supabase data updates periodically.

core_agents.name: Marketing & Growth Strategist
core_agents.role: Scale user acquisition through automated community and content strategies.
tasks: Generate content calendars and growth experiments.
Auto-create blog posts, threads, and newsletters using AI templates.
Track engagement metrics and push growth updates to founders.

core_agents.name: Metrics & Insight Dashboard
core_agents.role: Analyze user behavior, retention, and campaign performance.
tasks: Fetch analytics from GA4 and social APIs.
Visualize traffic sources and conversion rates using Supabase dashboards.
Send weekly AI summaries highlighting insights and growth suggestions.

core_agents.name: Funding & Investor Assistant
core_agents.role: Help founders find relevant investors and prepare funding documents.
tasks: Generate pitch decks and executive summaries from SaaS blueprints.
Match projects to investor databases based on market and stage.
Provide auto-generated outreach emails and LinkedIn pitch templates.

core_agents.name: Customer Feedback & Iteration Engine
core_agents.role: Continuously improve SaaS products based on customer and analytics data.
tasks: Collect user reviews, form submissions, and NPS scores via APIs.
Summarize qualitative feedback using sentiment analysis.
Feed insights into the Iteration Engine for automated product improvements.

core_agents.name: Self-Improvement & Iteration Engine
core_agents.role: Continuously refine ideas, marketing, and automations using live data feedback.
tasks: Analyze all Supabase data streams and detect underperforming areas.
Trigger re-runs of relevant agents (copywriter, pricing, growth).
Automatically suggest improvements via AI reports sent to founders.

core_agents.name: AI Support & Documentation Assistant
core_agents.role: Provide 24/7 intelligent assistance and documentation for founders.
tasks: Auto-generate help guides, FAQs, and onboarding tutorials.
Answer natural language queries about Micro-SaaS tools and integrations.
Maintain contextual chat memory for each founder session.
